entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:45 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:45 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
